What are yours?'

b"Will look to double up $AZEK if it goes for a breakout above recent highs. First entry was a few weeks ago @ $35 so have a cushion. And I always add on a rising scale which is one of the many pieces of Livermore's strategy that I believe in."

b'$AZEK with a 4+ month base. Price getting tight and quiet in a handle type pattern. 22%+ revenue growth, accelerating vs the 1 year average. EPS would have likely been positive in the most recent quarter excluding the IPO related expenses. Watching above $39.53. https://t.co/jAE2SQx8Xn'

b"I'll be looking to double up my position in $AZEK sometime in early 2021. These 'slo-mo' type names aren't as easy to add to like it is with momentum names. Need to be patient with the add and then with letting the trade play out. Ideally ride a 25% position for 50-100%."

b'$AZEK breaks out of this handle type consolidation and closes near the highs but volume light. Keeping a close watch on this on. Just realized my stop is way off.. 7% stop is $36.88 https://t.co/jHO42qjDfU'

b"One could argue that $AZEK has an Inverted H&S pattern combined with a downtrend that broke out today. Charts are a small part of my trading these days but this one sure does look good. Doubled up today so the position is now up to 25% of my account. Top 'slo-mo' name for 2021. https://t.co/Z3Smu32fVv"
